comprehensive_overview: Clang is a compiler front end for the C, C++, and Objective-C programming languages. It uses LLVM as its back end, providing highly optimized code generation. Clang is designed to provide fast compiles, expressive diagnostics, and a modular architecture for easy integration with other tools and libraries.
core_features: Support for C, C++, and Objective-C languages
Highly optimized code generation using LLVM back end
Modular architecture for easy integration with other tools and libraries
